posts.post_title: FS: T202 MORDECAI BROWN PSA 6 REALLY SPECTACULAR EXAMPLE
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Lichtman
Yes, it is quite the beauty, no?  Perhaps I should have added a few ++++ after the 6 in the title.  A number of +s really do drive up the price, I've noticed.

posts.post_title: FS: T202 MORDECAI BROWN PSA 6 REALLY SPECTACULAR EXAMPLE
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lee Behrens
How about a back scan.

The big question on a PSA graded T202 is what the back looks like.  The front is spectacular but I have seen way too many high Grade T202s with dirty stained backs.

posts.post_title: FS: T202 MORDECAI BROWN PSA 6 REALLY SPECTACULAR EXAMPLE
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Lichtman
The back is clean.
